questions.question:
What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    printf("%d", x++ - x);
}

What is the value of x after the following code?

int x = 5;
x = x + (x--);

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 7;
    printf("%d", x & (x - 1));
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 10;
    int y = 5;
    x = x & y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    x += (y++) + (++x);
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 2;
    int y = 3;
    x = (x + 1) * (y--);
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 7;
    int y = 2;
    int z = x && y;
    printf("%d", z);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 10;
    int y = 5;
    x = x / y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    int z = x >> y;
    printf("%d", z);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    x = x << y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    x ^= x & y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 3;
    int y = 7;
    x = x | y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    x = x - y * x;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 7;
    int y = 2;
    x |= y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    x ^= x | y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 7;
    int y = 2;
    x &= y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    x = x | (x & y);
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 3;
    int y = 7;
    x &= y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    x = x << (y - 1);
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 7;
    int y = 2;
    x = (x | y) << 1;
    printf("%d", x);
}
